overview: From 2025-03-09 to 2025-03-16, elizaos/eliza had 59 new PRs (46 merged), 13 new issues, and 38 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Fix Building a Social AI Agent in 15 Minutes
中文AI Agent 社区交流群

completedItems.title: revert: gets client back up (coming back to you)
fix: logger not properly formatting.
completedItems.body:
- Synchronously load `pino-pretty` to prevent mixed JSON and formatted logs
- Refactored `createStream()` to remove async initialization issues

This ensures that logs always appear in a human-readable format without JSON noise.

completedItems.title: 0xbbjoker/package scoped singleton db connections
completedItems.body:
# Database Connection Race Condition Fix

This PR fixes a race condition in the `@elizaos/plugin-sql` package where multiple database connections were being created unnecessarily. The issue occurred because module-level variables (`pgLite

completedItems.title: Fix: the org environment
completedItems.body:
Added an environment control of the character file so the user can just comment out the .env and not touch the code to activate the agents. The code already control both Discord and Telegram but the main is still Discord.

completedItems.title: fix: fix client fetch URL
completedItems.body:
uses a relative URL for fetch
this way
http://localhost:3000/
http://192.168.x.x:3000
or if you throw a hostname on it, they all work work

completedItems.title: feat: client wss
completedItems.body:
This PR uses WebSockets to handle client messages, ensuring that each agent/user in the chat has their own socket connection, managed by the WebSocketServer.

Additionally, this PR fixes a few issues, such as displaying room message memor

completedItems.title: chore: optimize cleanup script with `xargs`
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?
Replaces `-exec rm -rf {} +` with `xargs -0 rm -rf` in the cleanup script to improve performance when handling large lists of directories.

## What kind of change is this?
Performance improvement.

# Documenta
